tool_description: This API gives live updates about cryptocurrency prices and the latest news regarding it.
name: Crypto Update Live
title: Crypto Update Live

api_list.name: GET multiple coin details for your choice
api_list.description: This endpoint gives live detailed information about the current value of multiple cryptocurrencies. Separate coin name using "_" underscore symbol.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-update-live.p.rapidapi.com/multiplecoins/bitcoin_ethereum"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-update-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-update-live.p.rapidapi.com/multiplecoins/{crypto1_name_crypto2_name_crypto}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-update-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET Cryptocurrency Details
api_list.description: This endpoint gives live detailed information about the current value of a particular cryptocurrency.
